alive.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: It was a bad accident – they’re lucky to be alive.
We stayed alive by eating berries.
He was kept alive on a life-support machine.
Apparently he’s alive and well and living in Brazil.
alive.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Ancient traditions are very much alive in rural areas.
Christianity is alive and well in Asia.
The sport is still very much alive and kicking in this country.
alive.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: full of energy, happiness, activity etc
alive.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: It was the kind of morning when you wake up and feel really alive.
Her face was alive with excitement.
The whole house was alive with activity.
